titles.title: Celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Marine Corps Reserve Toys for Tots Program and celebrating the long history of the Marine Corps Reserve and the Marine Toys for Tots Foundation's commitments to serving the local communities across the United States.

Celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Marine Corps Reserve Toys for Tots Program and celebrating the long history of the Marine Corps Reserve and the Marine Toys for Tots Foundation's commitments to serving the local communities across the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and thanks the Marine Toys for Tots Foundation for its efforts to aid underserved children and celebrates the 75th anniversary of the Marine Corps Reserve Toys for Tots Program.
